    Ron Mercier - 001406973 The login screen controller handles all processes related to the login page.

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initializes the Login Form and retrieves the configured ResourceBundle objects
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - URL represents a Uniform Resource Locator, a pointer to a "resource" on the World Wide Web
        resourceBundle - Resource bundles contain locale-specific objects

      • login

        public void login​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Checks the database for a user with the given username and password. If the information is found, the user is stored in a variable so it can be used across the application.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - action event for login process
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - shows any exceptions for login process.

      • isUpcomingAppointments

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> isUpcomingAppointments()
        This method checks for an appointment that is upcoming which fits the 15 minute criteria. It adds it to a list and then it is returned.
        Returns:
        List of upcoming appointments

        public void exit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Closes the connection to the database exits the application.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - action event for exiting the application

      • loginActivitySuccess

        public void loginActivitySuccess​(java.lang.String username)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a successful login to the 'login_activity.txt' file
        Parameters:
        username - Username data from username_textfield
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Shows exception when error has occurred

      • loginActivityFailure

        public void loginActivityFailure​(java.lang.String username)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a failed login to the 'login_activity.txt' file
        Parameters:
        username - Username data from username_textfield
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - signals that an I/O exception has occurred
